docs.lead_paragraph: It is now ten years since a boy of twenty-one broke upon a public long used to "deep, premeditated lines" with "sudden and extemporal speech." "Plain Tales from the Hills" was the title of the volume in which the uneven thoughts of youth found crisp expression, and it hailed from India.

headline.main: KIPLING.; The New Collective Edition of His Verse and Prose Writings.*
